item.title: SlidingWindow
item.description: :ID: 518478cb-76da-4aba-9fd1-009455fdc5cb Aditya Verma Approach to sliding window : Identificatiion : Could be array or string. There is a window which is continous (doesnt break) . Question might ask related to subarray or substring .Also it can ask largest or smallest value in the question. Window size will be given or the question might ask to find out window size. Window size | Condition 2 Types of Sliding window problems: a.
